posts.name: Dinosaur Bar-B-Que *
posts.note: Barbecue chain serving Southern-style meats & draft brews in a retro setting (most have live music).

posts.name: Heid's of Liverpool
posts.note: Standby for hot dogs, sausages and other quick serve fare in nostalgic digs and adjacent ice cream shop.

posts.name: Market Diner
posts.note: Family-owned vintage diner with a mural of '50s-era stars serves up American comfort food.

posts.name: Pastabilities *
posts.note: Contemporary eatery serves homemade pasta dishes and Italian-American fare in a warm, brick interior.
